articles.author: Chris Fedor, cleveland.com
articles.title: Cavs pushed to brink of playoff elimination by Pacers in embarrassing 129-109 Game 4 loss - Cleveland.com
articles.description: Fresh off their first win, the Cavs entered Gainbridge Fieldhouse dripping with confidence, believing they had found answers to Indiana’s complex puzzle. Hardly.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS The Cavs dream season is one game from becoming a nightmare. 
Top-seeded Cleveland got embarrassed by the fourth-seeded Indiana Pacers on Sunday night, 129-109, in Game 4 of the Eastern… [+3948 chars]
